column1: The Pit Room////If you want some excellent Texas barbecue this is the spot for you! We have tried almost every meat here and they are all superb. I recommend the venison sausage and the turkey. Their sides are my most favorite out of any bbq place. Cole slaw is light but flavorful
column2: the potato salad isn't overly mayonnaise-y
column3: and if they have the charred green beans then it's a must to order them! Be warned though that on the serve yourself table the carrots and cucumbers are suuuuuper vinegary which is not a bad thing but it can totally catch you off guard if you aren't expecting it. It's nice that there are options for drinks as well
column4: bottled beer or beer on tap on the bbq side of things and then a full bar on the other side with additional seating.
